annotations: KUBOTA VIETNAM Jun 2011 Now Position Network and System Engineer + Job description Analyze and maintainthe IT Infrastructure of the company Network connectivity Server Switch Router Firewall Wi Fi System Printer Camera IP Phone System Projector Daily backup system states and restore as needed Windows update monthly Troubleshooting system and network problems diagnose and solve hardware or software faults Monitor and maintain server systems and network devices Repaire and replace parts as required Upgrade software and hardware for company network system Operate Windows server VMware AD DHCP DNS File Server Easy GA SCCM Set up new users' accounts profiles and password.
